content: designed for a very strong courageous woman who touched my life **materials and details** yarn 150 yards worsted weight yarn in color s of choice samples red heart hello gorgeous cactus flower pink sample peacock blue sample crochet hook i 5 5mm miscellaneous yarn needle sizes child 5-10 years teen-adult gauge i hook and 4 = 13 half_double_crochet and 9 rounds __________ **free patterns and more snappiness** * email help is available with each pattern purchase if you have any questions comments or suggestions please **send me an email** 5 * get a free snappy tots pattern on your birthday **sign up here** 6 * featured sale patterns of the week 7 * see my full line of over 600 patterns shop now 8 * new snappy pattern shop 9 * join my facebook group totally snappy 10 for specials events sneak peeks and giveaways please follow snappy tots on your favorite social media sites for giveaways new release announcements events and fun * facebook 11 * pinterest 12 * instagram 13 * twitter 14 _______________ copyright ©2019 snappy tots aka heidi yates no pattern may be reproduced or distributed in part or whole by any means without written permission graphics and pattern in part and whole may not be used for personal or profit finished products created from this pattern may be sold please include reference to snappy-tots com as pattern source when possible 5 mailto heidi@snappy-tots com 6 https //snappy-tots com/birthdays/ 7 http //www ravelry com/bundles/specials 8 http //shop snappy-tots com 9 https //snappy-tots-shop myshopify com/ 10 https //www facebook com/groups/totallysnappy/ 11 https //www facebook com/snappytots 12 https //www pinterest com/snappytots/ 13 https //www instagram com/snappytots/ 14 https //twitter com/snappytots
